name: Large Number Collider
description:
A simple timewasting puzzle inspired by 2048, made in few hours for Ludum Dare 50.

Quite possibly someone already made a variant like this, but I've never seen one, so I made it.

Use keyboard (A/D or left/right) or mouse (clunky, intended for mobile version) to rotate the particle around the chamber.

Press Space or click in the middle to launch the particle.

Particles with same color (or if one of them is white) and same number will collapse to a bigger particle. Try to beat the hi-score for the main particle.
